description: Set of 2-piece wooden puzzles with a number on one side and corresponding number of images on the matching piece, ie 3 with 3 bananas, 4 with 4 crabs.  Each puzzle will only fit with its match.   Numbered 1 – 20, the puzzles fit neatly into a wooden storage box with sliding lid.

Learn the letters of the alphabet in this fun lotto game from Orchard Toys. 4 different ways to play with reversible game board: match the picture to a picture; letter to a picture; picture to a letter – or letter to a letter! Very versatile for different skill levels depending on the age of the child.

The castle sits on a painted baseboard, with details including a painted moat.  Requires adult assembly.  Horse and characters shown in images not included. Bundle includes an assortment of 5 standing knights in armour with weapons, shields, flags, 2 knights on horseback , fierce dragon and trebuchet.

A colourful introduction to simple sums covering numbers 1 – 9. 81 brightly coloured wooden pieces allow a huge combination of simple sums to be worked out. Each tile has an addition or subtraction sum with the answer on the reverse and all tiles are number colour co-ordinated.e.g. all 3 sums are yellow. Stored in a sturdy box with sliding lid.

Children learn through play and Match and Spell will help develop early reading and spelling skills.  A fun word building game with two levels of play, carefully designed to: 1. Promote language and literacy skills, 2. Encourage letter recognition, 3. Reinforce matching skills.

Set of 2-piece wooden puzzles with a number on one side and corresponding number of images on the matching piece, ie 3 with 3 bananas, 4 with 4 crabs.  Each puzzle will only fit with its match.   Numbered 1 – 20, the puzzles fit neatly into a wooden storage box with sliding lid.

Big, robust brightly painted multi-level wooden toy garage from Le Toy Van with helicopter pad and working lift is fantastic fun. Little drivers will have fun winching-up cars in the working lift then zooming them down the curved ramps to fill up with petrol at the pumps.

A colourful introduction to simple sums covering numbers 1 – 9. 81 brightly coloured wooden pieces allow a huge combination of simple sums to be worked out. Each tile has an addition or subtraction sum with the answer on the reverse and all tiles are number colour co-ordinated.e.g. all 3 sums are yellow. Stored in a sturdy box with sliding lid.

An easy fun way to learn times tables with 81 bright wooden pieces stored in a sturdy wooden box with sliding lid. Each piece is printed with a multiplication, i.e. 3 x 7 and the answer is shown on the reverse – but no cheating! All pieces are colour coded to the appropriate number, i.e. 2 times table pieces are all orange, 3 times yellow etc, and covers table 1 - 9. So get practising!

Adorable new version of a traditional wooden hammering bench.  Hammer the five little mushrooms into their patch of grass using the cute rabbit shaped hammer.  Charming, subtle details will ensure little ones love playing with this novel toy.
